directions: Cut sausage, onion, green pepper, apple, tomatoes, and potatoes into 1-inch pieces and assemble on skewers.
Grill over medium-high heat for 10 minutes. During the last two minutes of grilling, glaze with apricot preserves to taste. Serve over heated sauerkraut.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage
title: Smoked Sausage Kabobs
